Notes: does not run on mySQL, requires IBM DB2 9.1 FP5, Oracle Database 10g 10.2.0.3, Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Enterprise Edition
runs on mySQL database for storing tag profiles. Can also be configured to run on Oracle Database 10g or Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Enterprise Edition

Cost (USD): $5 month/user if used as Software-as-a-Service, $4000 per server if installed (non expiring license)
Notes: Software-as-a-Service and installed option, full Java sources are provided in the installed version
